The binding resolution, which passed 92-4, requires public disclosure within two days of an objection being made by any senator to Senate action on legislation or nominations. Passage of this resolution is a victory for accountability. It will establish transparency with the significant power each senator holds to stop legislation and nominations, Chuck Grassley said.- Tom Latham Beaumont Mike Pence won't run, for president anyway Caucus junkies confounded by the late formal start of campaigning but long lists of possible candidates can cross

I have been wearing Unequal chest protectors, shoulder pads, and thigh pads for much of the late and post-season- resulting in pain-free playing," stated Michael Vick . the collapse of such a dictatorship was" inevitable" in Egypt, as well as in other countries throughout the world." What comes next, it's hard to predict," Patrick Leahy said. A huge part of( Egypt's) natural product is tourism. They've got to get tourists feeling free to go back. Nobody's about to book a trip to Egypt right now." The United States really needs stability there, Patrick Leahy continued," because of our interests in Israel and Jordan and elsewhere." Sen. Bernie Sanders , I-Vt., had a similar response and called on the United States to support a transition to democracy.
